nodes.text: Nobody's Perfect was a comic appearing in Star Wars Tales 20.
Before their wedding. Anakin tells Padmé some of the other sins he has done besides killing a Tusken Raider tribe. Those sins include:
Killing a colony of Desert Gnomes for giving him bad directions;
Beating up a homeless Wookiee for bumping into him;
Talking back to Obi-Wan and letting Obi-Wan take the blame for his mistakes;
Setting the Jedi Temple on fire.

After telling Padmé his mistakes he says he would understand if she cancels the wedding. Her response is to ask which wedding dress he thinks she should go with, the white one or the light pastel one.
